description.zh-cn: 由胡锦涛提出的中国共产党的指导思想之一，旨在实现以人为本，全面、协调、可持续的发展。该思想于2007年写入党章，2012年成为党的指导思想之一，2018年写入国家宪法。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, proposed by Hu Jintao, aiming to achieve people-oriented, comprehensive, coordinated, and sustainable development. It was written into the Party Constitution in 2007, became one of the Party's guiding ideologies in 2012, and was written into the national Constitution in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记，是科学发展观的主要提出者。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and was the main proposer of the Scientific Outlook on Development.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest-ranking position in the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，会议通过决议将科学发展观写入党章。
description.en: A National Congress of the Communist Party of China, during which a resolution was passed to write the Scientific Outlook on Development into the Party Constitution.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的根本法规。
description.en: The fundamental regulations of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的一次全国代表大会，会议将科学发展观确立为党的指导思想之一。
description.en: A National Congress of the Communist Party of China, which established the Scientific Outlook on Development as one of the Party's guiding ideologies.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
十三届全国人大一次会议

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国第十三届全国人民代表大会的第一次会议，会议通过宪法修正案，将科学发展观写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: The first session of the 13th National People's Congress of the People's Republic of China, which passed a constitutional amendment to write the Scientific Outlook on Development into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的根本法。
description.en: The fundamental law of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

zh-cn: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 由习近平提出的中国共产党的指导思想之一。
description.en: One of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China, proposed by Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 2002年至2003年间爆发的全球性传染病疫情。胡锦涛在全国防治非典工作会议上首次较完整地提出了科学发展观。
description.en: A global infectious disease outbreak that occurred between 2002 and 2003. Hu Jintao first presented the Scientific Outlook on Development in a relatively complete form at the National Work Conference on SARS Prevention and Control.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一个省份。
description.en: A province of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任国务院总理，推动将科学发展观提高到全党统一思想的高度。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Premier of the State Council and promoted the elevation of the Scientific Outlook on Development to the height of 'unifying the whole Party's thought'.

nodes.id: 深入学习实践科学发展观活动

zh-cn: 深入学习实践科学发展观活动

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在全党范围内分批开展的一项旨在深入学习和实践科学发展观的政治活动。
description.en: A political campaign launched by the Communist Party of China in batches across the entire party, aimed at deeply studying and practicing the Scientific Outlook on Development.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央总书记，曾担任中央深入学习实践科学发展观活动领导小组组长。
description.en: A Chinese politician, current General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, who once served as the head of the central leading group for the campaign to study and practice the Scientific Outlook on Development.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党提出的一个社会建设理念，是科学发展观的重要组成部分。
description.en: A concept of social construction proposed by the Communist Party of China, which is an important component of the Scientific Outlook on Development.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在2003年7月28日的全国防治非典工作会议上比较完整地提出了科学发展观。
description.en: Hu Jintao presented the Scientific Outlook on Development in a relatively complete form at the National Work Conference on SARS Prevention and Control on July 28, 2003.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十七次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在中国共产党第十七次全国代表大会上，通过决议将科学发展观写入《中国共产党章程》。
description.en: At the 17th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, a resolution was passed to write the Scientific Outlook on Development into the Constitution of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在中国共产党第十八次全国代表大会上，科学发展观被确立为中国共产党的指导思想之一。
description.en: At the 18th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, the Scientific Outlook on Development was established as one of the guiding ideologies of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议

description.zh-cn: 在2018年3月11日的第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议上，科学发展观被写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: On March 11, 2018, at the First Session of the 13th National People's Congress, the Scientific Outlook on Development was written into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想

description.zh-cn: 在2018年3月11日的第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议上，习近平新时代中国特色社会主义思想与科学发展观一同被写入《中华人民共和国宪法》。
description.en: On March 11, 2018, at the First Session of the 13th National People's Congress, Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era was written into the Constitution of the People's Republic of China along with the Scientific Outlook on Development.

position.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 文本中提及胡锦涛为前中共中央总书记。
description.en: The text mentions that Hu Jintao is the former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛在全国防治非典的工作会议上首次比较完整地提出了科学发展观，该事件为科学发展观的提出提供了背景和契机。
description.en: Hu Jintao first presented the Scientific Outlook on Development in a relatively complete form at the National Work Conference on SARS Prevention and Control, and this event provided the context and opportunity for its proposal.

description.zh-cn: 2003年4月15日，胡锦涛在广东视察时首次提出“要坚持全面的发展观”，这是科学发展观的雏形。
description.en: On April 15, 2003, during his inspection tour in Guangdong, Hu Jintao first proposed the need to 'adhere to a comprehensive view of development,' which was the prototype of the Scientific Outlook on Development.

description.zh-cn: 温家宝要求全党“统一思想，牢固树立和认真落实科学发展观”，将科学发展观提高到全党“统一思想”的高度。
description.en: Wen Jiabao demanded that the entire Party 'unify its thinking, firmly establish and conscientiously implement the Scientific Outlook on Development,' elevating it to the height of 'unifying the whole Party's thought'.

relationships.target: 深入学习实践科学发展观活动

description.zh-cn: 中共中央政治局于2008年9月5日决定在全党开展深入学习实践科学发展观活动。
description.en: On September 5, 2008, the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee decided to launch the campaign to study and practice the Scientific Outlook on Development throughout the entire Party.

relationships.target: 深入学习实践科学发展观活动

position.zh-cn: 中央深入学习实践科学发展观活动领导小组组长
position.en: Head of the Central Leading Group for the Campaign to Study and Practice the Scientific Outlook on Development

description.zh-cn: 时任国家副主席的习近平出任中央深入学习实践科学发展观活动领导小组组长，领导该活动的开展。
description.en: Then Vice President Xi Jinping was appointed as the head of the Central Leading Group for the Campaign to Study and Practice the Scientific Outlook on Development, leading the implementation of the campaign.

relationships.source: 深入学习实践科学发展观活动

description.zh-cn: 该活动旨在全党范围内深入学习和实践科学发展观。
description.en: This campaign aimed to deeply study and practice the Scientific Outlook on Development throughout the entire Party.

description.zh-cn: 构建社会主义和谐社会是科学发展观的主要内容之一。
description.en: Building a harmonious socialist society is one of the main components of the Scientific Outlook on Development.
